verses.verse: Now it <S%H8085>happened,<s%> when it was reported to <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> and to <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabian,<s%> and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies,<s%> that I had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and that there was no <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H1571>therein;<s%> (though even to that <S%H6256>time<s%> I had not set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates;<s%>)

that <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> and <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H3259>meet<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in the <S%H3715>villages<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H207>Ono.<s%>" But they <S%H2803>intended<s%> <S%H6213>to<s%> harm <S%H7451>me.<s%>

I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "I am <S%H6213>doing<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> so that I <S%H3201>can't<s%> come <S%H3381>down.<s%> Why should the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H7673>cease,<s%> <S%H834>while<s%> I <S%H7503>leave<s%> <S%H3381>it,<s%> and come down to you?"
They <S%H7971>sent<s%> to me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> after this <S%H1697>sort;<s%> and I <S%H7725>answered<s%> them the same <S%H1697>way.<s%>

Then <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> to me the same <S%H1697>way<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> with an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H107>letter<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%>

in which was <S%H3789>written,<s%> "It is <S%H8085>reported<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H1654>Gashmu<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3064>it,<s%> that you and the Jews <S%H2803>intend<s%> to <S%H4775>rebel.<s%> Because of <S%H1933>that,<s%> you are <S%H1129>building<s%> the <S%H2346>wall.<s%> You would <S%H1933>be<s%> their <S%H4428>king,<s%> according to these <S%H1697>words.<s%>

You have also <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H7121>preach<s%> of you at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4428><s%> 'There is a king in <S%H3063>Judah!<s%>' Now it will be <S%H8085>reported<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> according to these <S%H1697>words.<s%> <S%H3212>Come<s%> now <S%H3289>therefore,<s%> and let us take counsel <S%H3162>together.<s%>"

Then I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "There <S%H1961>are<s%> no such <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H1961>done<s%> as you <S%H559>say,<s%> but you <S%H908>imagine<s%> them out of your own <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"

For they all would have made us <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Their <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be <S%H7503>weakened<s%> from the <S%H4399>work,<s%> that it not be <S%H6213>done.<s%> But <S%H2388>now,<s%> strengthen my <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

I <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> who was shut <S%H6113>in<s%> at his <S%H559>home;<s%> and he said, "Let us meet <S%H3259>together<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and let us <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple;<s%> for they will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3915>you;<s%> yes, in the night will they <S%H935>come<s%> to kill <S%H2026>you.<s%>"

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Should <S%H3644>such<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> as I <S%H1272>flee?<s%> Who is there <S%H935>that,<s%> being such as I, would go into the <S%H1964>temple<s%> to save his <S%H2425>life?<s%> I will not go <S%H935>in.<s%>"

I <S%H5234>discerned,<s%> and <S%H430>behold,<s%> God had not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1696>him;<s%> but he pronounced this <S%H5016>prophecy<s%> against <S%H2900>me.<s%> Tobiah and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> had hired <S%H7936>him.<s%>

He <S%H7936>hired<s%> so that I would be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> do <S%H6213>so,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and that they might have material for an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>report,<s%> that they might reproach <S%H2778>me.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> according to these their <S%H4639>works,<s%> and also the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%> <S%H5129>Noadiah,<s%> and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> that would have put me in <S%H3372>fear.<s%>"
So the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was <S%H7999>finished<s%> in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of <S%H435>Elul,<s%> in <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

It <S%H341>happened,<s%> when all our enemies <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H1471>it,<s%> that all the nations that were about <S%H5439>us<s%> were <S%H5439>afraid,<s%> and were <S%H3966>much<s%> cast <S%H5307>down<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> for they <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that this <S%H4399>work<s%> was <S%H4399>worked<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Moreover in those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1980>sent<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> to <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>'s letters came to <S%H935>them.<s%>

For there were <S%H7227>many<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1167>sworn<s%> to <S%H2860>him,<s%> because he was the son-in-law of <S%H7935>Shecaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H733>Arah;<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Berechiah as <S%H1296>wife.<s%>

Also they <S%H559>spoke<s%> of his good <S%H2896>deeds<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3318>me,<s%> and reported my <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H2900>him.<s%> Tobiah <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> to put me in <S%H3372>fear.<s%>
